channel.title: Tourism on Bryan Ford's Home Page
channel.description: Recent content in Tourism on Bryan Ford's Home Page

item.title: Sightseeing Around Lausanne
item.description: For the benefit those visiting but not yet familiar with EPFL, Lausanne, or other parts of the Lake Geneva Region, I thought I'd write a quick summary of some of my personal favorite places and sights in the area. This is completely my personal perspective; I make no pretense at being objective or unbiased here and am not trying to write a proper travel guide. But with that in mind, I hope you might find something interesting here.
